author: Madeline MacGregor
title: Manzanita rest area re-opened
text:
OTE Home > News > News & Press > Manzanita rest area re-opened Manzanita rest area re-opened 
Posted on: July 13th,   News & Press | No Comments 
UPDATE: Tuesday, July 14, 2015: Manzanita Rest Area (I-5) is now fully open and serving the public both north and southbound. 
Manzanita Rest Area along Interstate 5, north of Grants Pass, is closed both directions (north and southbound) due to major water/plumbing issues. Repairs should be completed by Wednesday, July 15th. However, if staff are able to complete repairs earlier, we will update this post. 
The next closest rest areas are: North of Grants Pass: Cabin Creek, near Roseburg South of Grants Pass: Suncrest, south of Medford 
Thank you for your patience. Share this post:
